name: Actual Snow
description: It's snow. Not the nice, thick, crunchy kind though... more the disgustingly wet, slushy kind... Guess we can make stuff from it.

name: Adaptive Control Unit
description: Project Part #5. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Adequate Pioneering
description: The statue of the Running Character.

name: AI Limiter
description: AI Limiters are super advanced electronics that are used to control AIs and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.

name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
description: Thin, lightweight, and highly durable sheets that are mainly used for products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength.

name: Alien Protein
description:
Ground down Alien Remains in a neat little package.
Used for medical purposed and to research alien organisms.

name: Alumina Solution
description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into Aluminum Scrap for Aluminum Ingot production.

name: Aluminum Casing
description: A versatile container cast from Aluminum Ingots.

name: Aluminum Ingot
description:
Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap, which is refined from Alumina Solution.
Used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

name: Aluminum Scrap
description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

name: Assembly Director System
description:
Project Part #6. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

This extremely fast and precise computing system is specifically designed to direct the Project Assembly: Assembly Phase.

name: Automated Wiring
description: Project Part #3. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Battery
description: Primarily used as fuel for Drones and Vehicles.

name: Bauxite
description: Bauxite is used to produce Alumina, which can be further refined into the Aluminum Scrap required to produce Aluminum Ingots.

name: Beacon
description:
PENDING REMOVAL
This item will (likely) be removed in a future update.

Currently only used as an ingredient in an alternative recipe.

name: Biomass
description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy-efficient than raw biological matter.

name: Black Powder
description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce simple explosives.

name: Blue FICSMAS Ornament
description: Again, used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

name: Blue Power Slug
description: A strange slug radiating a weak strange power.

name: Cable
description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build power lines.

name: Candy Cane
description:
A delicious Candy Cane to be enjoyed during the FICSMAS Holidays.
*Disclaimer: Can't be consumed...

name: Caterium Ingot
description: Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

name: Caterium Ore
description: Caterium Ore is smelted into Caterium Ingots. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

name: Circuit Board
description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

name: Cluster Nobelisk
description: A Nobelisk that detonates into multiple smaller explosions. Practical when clearing out large areas of vegetation and other inconveniences.

name: Coal
description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators and for steel production.

name: Color Cartridge
description:
Used for applying Patterns to structures with the Customizer.

(Patterns can be purchased in the AWESOME Shop.)

name: Compacted Coal
description: A much more efficient alternative for Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators.

name: Computer
description: A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behaviour in machines.

name: Concrete
description:
Used for building.
Good for stable foundations.

name: Confusing Creature
description: The statue of the Space Giraffe.

name: Cooling System
description: Used to keep temperatures of advanced parts and buildings from exceeding to inefficient levels.

name: Copper FICSMAS Ornament
description: Still used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

name: Copper Ingot
description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

name: Copper Ore
description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for electricity.

name: Copper Powder
description:
Ground down Copper Ingots.
The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, make this part fit for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.

name: Copper Sheet
description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

name: Crude Oil
description: Crude Oil is refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

name: Crystal Oscillator
description: A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

name: Electromagnetic Control Rod
description: Control Rods regulate power output via electromagnetism.

name: Empty Canister
description: Used to package fluids for transportation.

name: Empty Fluid Tank
description: Used to package gases and volatile liquids for transportation.

name: Encased Industrial Beam
description:
Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

name: Encased Plutonium Cell
description:
Plutonium Cells are concrete encased Plutonium Pellets.
Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

name: Encased Uranium Cell
description:
Uranium Cells are produced from Uranium Ore.
Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

name: Explosive Rebar
description: Explodes on impact, dealing heavy damage.

name: Fabric
description:
Used for equipment crafting.
Flexible but durable fabric.

name: Fancy Fireworks
description:
Fireworks are produced from random ingredients. Primarily used for having a good time.

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

name: FICSIT Coupon
description: A special FICSIT bonus program Coupon, obtained through the AWESOME Sink. Can be redeemed in the AWESOME Shop for bonus milestones and rewards.

name: FICSMAS Bow
description: A fancy Bow, maybe someone can wear this? You certainly can't! Probably, some parts and decorations can be made from this.

name: FICSMAS Decoration
description: A decoration used to make decorations. Its use cases are questionable.

name: FICSMAS Gift
description:
Special FICSMAS buildings and parts can be obtained and produced from this FICSIT Holiday present.

*Watch the sky for deliveries from orbit!

name: FICSMAS Ornament Bundle
description: All the FICSMAS Ornaments smashed together to make even more FICSMAS Decorations!

name: FICSMAS Tree Branch
description: A special Tree Branch, used to produce parts and buildings during the FICSMAS Event.

name: FICSMAS Wonder Star
description: This special FICSMAS Star signifies the productivity of FICSIT all across the universe. It also signifies the fact that you have nearly completed the Holiday Event, so it's time to get back to work.

name: Flower Petals
description:
Used for crafting.
Colorful native flower petals.

name: Fuel
description: Fuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

name: Fused Modular Frame
description: A corrosion resistant, nitride hardened, highly robust, yet lightweight modular frame.

name: Gas Filter
description: Used in the Gas Mask to filter out toxics and pollutants from the air.

name: Gas Nobelisk
description: Instead of a regular explosion, this Nobelisk creates a deadly gas cloud.

name: Golden Nut
description: The statue of the Golden Nut.

name: Heat Sink
description: Used to dissipate heat faster.

name: Heavy Modular Frame
description: A more robust multi-purpose frame.

name: Heavy Oil Residue
description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

name: High-Speed Connector
description: The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.

name: Homing Rifle Ammo
description:
The bullet guidance system, build into this ammunition, allows it to accurately hit any target within the reticle area.
Especially useful when dealing with agile threats, or for Pioneers who can't be bothered to aim properly.

name: Iodine Infused Filter
description: Used in the Hazmat Suit to absorb radioactive particles.

name: Iron FICSMAS Ornament
description: This super special... nope... still just used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

name: Iron Ingot
description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

name: Iron Ore
description:
Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

name: Iron Plate
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Iron Rebar
description: A simple iron rebar that can be shot using the Rebar Gun, for self-defense purposes.

name: Iron Rod
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Leaves
description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

name: Limestone
description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for stable foundations.

name: Liquid Biofuel
description: Liquid Biofuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

name: Lizard Doggo Statue
description: The statue of the Lizard Doggo.

name: Magnetic Field Generator
description:
Project Part #7. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce an easily expandable and powerful magnetic field.

name: Modular Engine
description: Project Part #4. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Modular Frame
description:
Used for crafting.
Multi-purpose building block.

name: Motor
description: The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

name: Mycelia
description:
Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

name: Nitric Acid
description: Produced by reaction of Nitrogen Gas with Water. Its high corrosiveness and oxidizing properties make it an excellent choice for refinement and fuel production processes.

name: Nitrogen Gas
description: Nitrogen can be used in a variety of ways, such as metallurgy, cooling, and Nitric Acid production. On Massage-2(AB)b, it can be extracted from underground gas wells.

name: Nobelisk
description: A simple explosive, useful for clearing boulders, vegetation, and other obstacles.

name: Non-fissile Uranium
description:
The isotope Uranium-238 is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be conversed into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

name: Nuclear Pasta
description:
Project Part #9. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.

name: Nuke Nobelisk
description:
This Nobelisk uses a nuclear fission reaction to generate a massive explosion.

WARNING: Ensure all FICSIT property is clear of the blast zone before detonation.

name: Organic Data Capsule
description:
This data capsule translates organic chemicals into readable alien genetics information.
Used for researching alien organisms.

name: Packaged Alumina Solution
description: Alumina Solution, packaged for alternative transport.

name: Packaged Fuel
description: Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

name: Packaged Liquid Biofuel
description: Liquid Biofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

name: Packaged Nitric Acid
description: Nitric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

name: Packaged Nitrogen Gas
description: Nitrogen Gas, packaged for alternative transport.

name: Packaged Oil
description: Crude Oil, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

name: Packaged Sulfuric Acid
description: Sulfuric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

name: Packaged Turbofuel
description: Turbofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

name: Packaged Water
description: Water, packaged for alternative transport.

name: Petroleum Coke
description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue.
Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.

name: Plastic
description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

name: Plutonium Fuel Rod
description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Plutonium Waste when consumed.
Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

name: Plutonium Pellet
description:
Produced in the Particle Accelerator through conversion of Non-fissile Uranium.
Used to produce Encased Plutonium Cells for Plutonium Fuel Rods.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

name: Plutonium Waste
description:
The by-product of consuming Plutonium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Needs to be stored in a safe location. Handle with caution.

Caution: EXTREMELY Radioactive.

name: Polymer Resin
description:
Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

name: Power Shard
description:
Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard.
It radiates a strange power.

name: Pressure Conversion Cube
description: Converts outgoing force into internal pressure. Required to contain unstable, high-energy matter.

name: Pretty Good Pioneering
description: The statue of the Clapping Character.

name: Pulse Nobelisk
description: Instead of a regular explosion, this Nobelisk generates a powerful shockwave.

name: Purple Power Slug
description: A strange slug radiating a powerful strange power.

name: Quantum Computer
description: Uses Quantum bits instead of normal bits which makes it much faster than a treaditional computer.

name: Quartz Crystal
description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Used in the production of advanced radar technology and high-quality display screens.

name: Quickwire
description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

name: Radio Control Unit
description: Enhances and directs radio signals.

name: Raw Quartz
description: Raw Quartz can be processed into Quartz Crystals and Silica, which both offer a variety of applications.

name: Red FICSMAS Ornament
description: Used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

name: Reinforced Iron Plate
description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

name: Rifle Ammo
description: Standard issue Rifle ammunition, useful for establishing dominance.

name: Rotor
description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

name: Rubber
description: Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.

name: S.A.M. Ore
description: Strange Alien Metal that glistens with new possibilities.

name: Satisfactory Pioneering
description: The statue of the Character Spinning the Build Gun.

name: Screw
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Shatter Rebar
description: This rebar fractures when shot, launching deadly debris in a wide spread but with limited range.

name: Silica
description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Commonly used to create glass structures, advanced refinement processes, and alternative production of electronics.

name: Silver Hog
description: The statue of the Silver Pouncing Hog. Perfect as a hood ornament.

name: Smart Plating
description: Project Part #1. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Smokeless Powder
description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce modern firearms.

name: Snowball
description:
Compressed dihydrogen monoxide crystals.

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

name: Solid Biofuel
description: The most energy-efficient form of solid biomass. Can be used as fuel for the Chainsaw.

name: Sparkly Fireworks
description:
Goes Pfffeeeeew... BOOM! *Sparkle*

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

name: Stator
description:
Used for crafting.
The static parts of a motor.

name: Steel Beam
description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

name: Steel Ingot
description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

name: Steel Pipe
description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

name: Stun Rebar
description:
Electrocutes the target on impact, stunning it for a short time.

Stun duration: 5 seconds

name: Sulfur
description: Sulfur is primarily used for Black Powder.

name: Sulfuric Acid
description: A mineral acid produced by combining Sulfur and Water in a complex reaction. Primarily used in refinement processes and Battery production.

name: Supercomputer
description: The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.

name: Superposition Oscillator
description: A superposition oscillator is an oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create a string vibration with a precise frequancy. Often used in teleportation technology and dimensional manipulation.

name: Sweet Fireworks
description:
Merry FICSMAS and a Happy New Year!

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

name: Thermal Propulsion Rocket
description:
Project Part #8. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Uses extreme heat to produce the high pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.

name: Turbo Motor
description: The Turbo Motor is a more complex, and more powerful, version of the regular Motor.

name: Turbo Rifle Ammo
description: Lightweight, compact, and volatile. These rounds provide extreme capacity and fire rates, at the cost of accuracy.

name: Turbofuel
description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

name: Uranium
description:
Uranium is a radioactive element.
Used to produce Encased Uranium Cells for Uranium Fuel Rods.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

name: Uranium Fuel Rod
description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Uranium Waste when consumed.
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

name: Uranium Waste
description:
The by-product of consuming Uranium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Non-fissible Uranium can be extracted. Handle with caution.

Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

name: Versatile Framework
description: Project Part #2. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Water
description: It's water.

name: Wire
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Wood
description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

name: Yellow Power Slug
description: A strange slug radiating a strange power.
